feature.name: 3CC DL Carrier Aggregation Extension   4CC DL Carrier Aggregation Extension
feature.summary: The 3CC DL Carrier Aggregation Extension feature can transmit data to a single UE on

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchFormat3PrbPairs
parameters.description: The attribute must be set to 1 in cells to be used as PCell. Only                                 values 0 and 1 are supported.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.noOfPucchFormat3PrbPairs
parameters.description: The attribute must be set to 1 in cells to be used as PCell. Only                                 values 0 and 1 are supported.

parameters.name: CarrierAggregationFunction.sCellSelectionMode
parameters.description: Recommended to be set to                                     UN_ACK_SIMULTANEOUS_SCELL_SELECTION or                                     ACK_SIMULTANEOUS_SCELL_SELECTION. If the PCell                                 has good coverage overlap with the SCells, these settings reduce                                 latency on initial SCell selection.

parameters.name: QciProfileOperatorDefined.tReorderingDl
parameters.description: See MOM description.  For UEs with at least Category 11 and 3CC Carrier Aggregation             capability, the value of 25 ms is used in RRC reconfiguration messages for downlink AM DRBs instead of the value configured in the                 QciProfileOperatorDefined.tReorderingDl attribute if the 3CC DL             Carrier Aggregation Extension feature is activated.

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.tReorderingDl
parameters.description: See MOM description.  For UEs with at least Category 11 and 3CC Carrier Aggregation             capability, the value of 25 ms is used in RRC reconfiguration messages for downlink AM DRBs instead of the value configured in the                 QciProfilePredefined.tReorderingDl attribute if the 3CC DL             Carrier Aggregation Extension feature is activated.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011714 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011714 MO instance.
